Articles.Content: After spending more than 40 hours of launching Kerbals in space, exploding Kerbals in space, trying to dock kerbals in space but mixing up decrease with increase throttle and crashing my ship into my space station which results in a huge explosion, yes right IN SPACE... i finally made it to the forum to say hello and yeah to do all the other thingies a man can do here
Welcome newcomer! I hope you enjoy this as much as I do! Have fun on the forums!
